variable.name: r_grenadetrail
variable.description: Customizable grenade trails 0 = No rocket trail 1 = Normal 2 = Grenade trail 3 = Alt normal trail 4 = Slight blood trail 5 = Big blood trail 6 = Tracer1 trail 7 = Tracer2 trail 8 = Plasma trail 9 = Lavaball trail 10 = Fuel Rod Gun trail 11 = Plasma Rocket Mk II trail
variable.remarks: Works the same way as r_rockettrail, but for grenades.
